sentence.Network_en: The occurrence and distribution auriferous quartz is strictly controlled by NNE - NE fault.
sentence.Network_cn: 含金石英脉的产出和分布严格受NNE—NE向断裂控制.

sentence.Network_en: Gold ore main type is auriferous quartz vein type.
sentence.Network_cn: 金矿床主要为含金硫化物石英脉型.

sentence.Network_en: An experimental research on auriferous high - sulfur copper ore flotation with a new reagent was carried out.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用新药剂对某含金高硫铜矿石进行了系统浮选试验研究.
